name: Clash of Chefs VR
summary: Ready, set, cook! Clash of Chefs VR is a competitive cooking game that’ll put your culinary skills to the test as you race to finish orders. Complete 100 single player stages, or take on human opponents in both real-time and asynchronous competitive multiplayer with five unique restaurants, each with their own recipes and ingredients to master. Cook the orders, serve them up, and slap your opponents with your leftovers as you race to become the greatest chef in the world!
